name: Stranded, Jumbled, Scrambled... In Space
description:
Instructions:

Mouse cursor to move your claw

Left mouse button to grab

Movement controls are not pre-determined, you'll need most of your keyboard. Controls are displayed on the edge of the screen  for each direction

Bring the cargo scattered about the asteroid field to the cargo ship.

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam, theme is Out of Control.

Touching an asteroid will scramble your controls. Your claw will release if it touches an asteroid.

All art and programming done by Toby Wishart
